data.description: an ASPseek front end and wrapper
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
ASPseek is an sql-hybrid search engine (http:://www.aspseek.org)
    with three main components, an indexer a search daemon and a cgi
    front end. There is also an optional apache module which replaces
    the cgi component. Both the cgi and apache module have most of their
    functionality in an included library. It is my intent to provide a
    wraper to this library and to provide a framework for aditional
    server side processing.
